chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
L: Language
codeF: Functions L -> nat
codeR: Relations L -> nat
var: nat -> fol.Term L
apply: forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L
codeFormula: fol.Formula L -> nat
codeTerm: fol.Term L -> nat

Goal:
forall (v0 : nat) (a : fol.Formula L) (z1 z2 : forall b : fol.Formula L, lt_depth L b (forallH L v0 a) -> nat * fol.Term L -> nat), (forall (b : fol.Formula L) (q : lt_depth L b (forallH L v0 a)) (r : nat * fol.Term L), z1 b q r = z2 b q r) -> forall q : nat * fol.Term L, makeTraceForall v0 a z1 q = makeTraceForall v0 a z2 q

Formula_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Formula L -> Set), (forall t t0 : fol.Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : fol.Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : fol.Formula L), P f3 -> P (forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : fol.Formula L, P f4
Formula_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Formula L -> Prop), (forall t t0 : fol.Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : fol.Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : fol.Formula L), P f3 -> P (forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : fol.Formula L, P f4
Formula_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Formula L -> Type), (forall t t0 : fol.Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : fol.Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : fol.Formula L), P f3 -> P (forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : fol.Formula L, P f4
Formula_sind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Formula L -> SProp), (forall t t0 : fol.Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : fol.Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : fol.Formula L), P f3 -> P (forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : fol.Formula L, P f4
nil : list ?A where ?A : [L : Language codeF : Functions L -> nat codeR : Relations L -> nat var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L codeFormula := code.codeFormula L codeF codeR : fol.Formula L -> nat codeTerm := code.codeTerm L codeF : fol.Term L -> nat |- Type]
cons : ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [L : Language codeF : Functions L -> nat codeR : Relations L -> nat var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L codeFormula := code.codeFormula L codeF codeR : fol.Formula L -> nat codeTerm := code.codeTerm L codeF : fol.Term L -> nat |- Type]
substituteFormulaImp : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L), (nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L f}) -> forall g : fol.Formula L, (nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L g}) -> nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L (impH L f g)}
makeTrace = Formula_depth_rec2 L (fun _ : fol.Formula L => nat * fol.Term L -> nat) (fun (t t0 : fol.Term L) (p : nat * fol.Term L) => let v := fst p in let s := snd p in cTriple (cTriple v (codeTerm s) (codeFormula (equal L t t0))) (codeFormula (substituteFormula L (equal L t t0) v s)) 0) (fun (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))) (p : nat * fol.Term L) => let v := fst p in let s := snd p in cTriple (cTriple v (codeTerm s) (codeFormula (atomic L r t))) (codeFormula (substituteFormula L (atomic L r t) v s)) 0) makeTraceImp makeTraceNot makeTraceForall : fol.Formula L -> nat * fol.Term L -> nat
makeTraceImp = fun (f1 : fol.Formula L) (f1rec : nat * fol.Term L -> nat) (f2 : fol.Formula L) (f2rec : nat * fol.Term L -> nat) (p : nat * fol.Term L) => let v := fst p in let s := snd p in cTriple (cTriple v (codeTerm s) (codeFormula (impH L f1 f2))) (codeFormula (substituteFormula L (impH L f1 f2) v s)) (cPair (f1rec p) (f2rec p)) : fol.Formula L -> (nat * fol.Term L -> nat) -> fol.Formula L -> (nat * fol.Term L -> nat) -> nat * fol.Term L -> nat Arguments makeTraceImp _ _%function_scope _ _%function_scope
Inductive Term (L : Language) : Set := var : nat -> fol.Term L | apply : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L with Terms (L : Language) : nat -> Set := Tnil : fol.Terms L 0 | Tcons : forall n : nat, fol.Term L -> fol.Terms L n -> fol.Terms L (S n) Arguments fol.var _ _%nat_scope Arguments fol.Terms _ _%nat_scope Arguments Tcons _ _%nat_scope
Term_Terms_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Prop) (P0 : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L), P t -> forall t0 : fol.Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Term_Terms_rec_full : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Set) (P0 : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Set), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L), P t -> forall t0 : fol.Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Inductive Formula (L : Language) : Set := equal : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L | atomic : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L | impH : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L | notH : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L | forallH : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L Arguments forallH _ _%nat_scope
Term_Terms_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : Set) (P0 : nat -> Set), (nat -> P) -> (forall f0 : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0)) -> P0 (arity L (inr f0)) -> P) -> P0 0 -> (forall n : nat, fol.Term L -> P -> fol.Terms L n -> P0 n -> P0 (S n)) -> fol.Term L -> P
Term_sind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> SProp), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Term_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Term_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Set), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Term_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Type), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t

```coq
intros v0 a z1 z2 H q.
unfold makeTraceForall.
apply substituteFormulaForallNice.
intros b q' r.
apply H.
Qed.```
